title: [Self-directed] Workshop for Developing Teaching Guides Based on Mathematics Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and general familiarity with educational environments
context.additional_context: Focused on developing practical guides to strengthen mathematics education competencies within the language education domain, as most learners are teaching assistants or pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structure and functionality of mathematics education guides using a documentary didactic approach
Learners can apply criteria to evaluate the richness (Richness) of mathematical activities across content, process, cognitive demands, and class management dimensions
Learners can identify improvements in existing mathematics education guides using analytical tools and design practical teaching guides
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
